dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark for various tasks in autonomous driving, including object detection, tracking, and segmentation, providing a diverse set of urban scenes captured from a moving vehicle.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: M. Siam
H. Mahgoub
M. Zahran
S. Yogamani
M. Jagersand
A. El-Sallab
dcterms:description: The KITTI MOD dataset is designed for motion detection, providing labeled data for static and dynamic vehicles, facilitating the evaluation of algorithms for recognizing object motion.
dcterms:title: KITTI MOD
